refnamediv.refpurpose: Performs matching of the shell globbing pattern with the names of all the objects in the database. It returns all those that successfully match.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Performs matching of the globbing_expression with the names of all the objects in the database. It returns all those that successfully match.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the expand command to display a list of all database object names having a particular ending.

example.title: Display a list of database object names having a particular ending.

listitem.para: A list of all database object names that end in .r is displayed.
